cluster_information.name: Laundry Dryer Controls
cluster_information.description: This cluster provides a way to access options associated with the operation of a laundry dryer device type.

DrynessLevelEnum.description: This enum provides a representation of the level of dryness that will be used while drying in a selected mode.

0.name: Low
0.summary: Provides a low dryness level for the selected mode

1.name: Normal
1.summary: Provides the normal level of dryness for the selected mode

2.name: Extra
2.summary: Provides an extra dryness level for the selected mode

3.name: Max
3.summary: Provides the max dryness level for the selected mode

0x0000.name: SupportedDrynessLevels
0x0000.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the list of supported dryness levels available to the appliance in the currently selected mode. At least one dryness level value SHALL be provided in the SupportedDrynessLevels list. The list of dryness levels MAY change depending on the currently-selected Laundry Dryer mode.

0x0001.name: SelectedDrynessLevel
0x0001.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the currently-selected dryness level and it SHALL be the index into the SupportedDrynessLevels list of the selected dryness level. A value of null SHALL indicate that there will be no dryness level setting for the current mode.
